name: Who Killed the Albino Squirrel?
description:
Who did it? 🔪🐿️

Who Killed the Albino Squirrel?  is a short murder mystery, visual novel that has you investigate the death of UT Austin's beloved albino squirrel. Play as the protagonist, gather evidence from investigations, and piece together the mystery surrounding the albino squirrel's death.



CONTROLS
A mouse or a trackpad is all you need to progress through the story!



CREDITS

  • Mostafa Amir - Programmer 
  • Kayleen Kim - UI Design, Background Designer, & Implementation
  • Michelle Zhang - Character Designer and Script Writer
  • Sarah Cheng - Character Designer
